name: Rookie Egg Jugglers
description:
DESCRIPTION

Rookie Egg Jugglers is a simple, basic game for the NES inspired by the Game & Watch game, "Ball". Originally only released on the now defunct forum "NintendoAge" back in late 2017.

You control two characters with the main, repetitive objective of juggling an egg in a tennis court. You score a point each time you juggle an egg, if you fail to catch an egg, you get a miss. Three misses and the game is over.

If you manage to score 200, 500 and 700, your misses will be cleared. If you haven't missed at all, the points scored will be doubled.

How high of a score can you get?

CONTROLS

Left and Right - Moves the Red Juggler left and right.
A and B Buttons - Moves the Blue Juggler left and right.
Start Button - Pauses the game.
